content: Fresh Graduates Savings Bank Account Investments General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Oct 2018What should I do with my $18,000 savings that is stored in my ePOSBkids Account?I'm 25 and have around $18,000 savings in my ePOSBkids Account. Recently read about what I should do with my salary (20-50-30 rule). I'm very keen on growing this small sum of savings, but have never invested before. Not even in the STI ETF / Robo-advisors, which I would be starting on with my monthly pay. What should I do with my $18,000 savings?Also, any tips on how a newbie like me should start looking at higher risk investments than the STI ETF / Robo-advisors?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Lam Ka YingLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 17 May 2019Move to a better savings account like DBS Multiplier for higher interests!0 comments0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 09 Oct 2018If you are starting on ETF or robo advisor with monthly pay then keep it as emergency savings for rainy day. Can put in singapore saving bond.0 comments0
